item.title: DEFCON 31 + BlackHat 2023
item.description: Defcon 31 & BlackHat USA 2023 with Friends Overview This year was the first year I was able to come back and see my friends at Defcon & Black Hat. The experience was wonderful! I got to meet people that I have been talking to for years online but never met. One of those wonderful people was Admiral! He has been my mentor since 2020 when I first joined the DC801 Defcon Group.
